name: Bloodrite Invoker
oracle_text: {8}: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
flavor_text:
"The brood lineages unfolded across the world, each patterned after one of three progenitors, each a study in mindless consumption."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

name: Bloodthrone Vampire
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Some humans willingly offered up their blood, hoping it would grant the vampire families the strength to stave off the Eldrazi.

name: Cadaver Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.

name: Caravan Escort
oracle_text:
Level up {2} ({2}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-4
2/2
LEVEL 5+
5/5
First strike

name: Daggerback Basilisk
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text:
"Petrifying gaze, deadly fangs, knifelike dorsal spines, venomous saliva . . . Am I missing anything? . . . Toxic bones? Seriously?"
—Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

name: Dominator Drone
oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Ingest (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library.)
When Dominator Drone enters the battlefield, if you control another colorless creature, each opponent loses 2 life.

name: Emrakul's Hatcher
oracle_text: When Emrakul's Hatcher enters the battlefield, create three 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature tokens. They have "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: Wordlessly it leads its abhorrent brood.

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.

name: Explorer's Scope
oracle_text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Forked Bolt
oracle_text: Forked Bolt deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
flavor_text:
"Play no favorites. Everybody dies."
—Sparkmage saying

name: Graypelt Hunter
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever Graypelt Hunter or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Graypelt Hunter.
flavor_text: He'll cleave wood and bone alike to carve a path for his allies.

name: Grazing Gladehart
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Don't be fooled. If it were as docile as it looks, it would've died off long ago."
—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

name: Groundswell
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.
flavor_text: "This world will not be tamed."

name: Harrow
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The Roil redraws the world as it passes, leaving only the hedrons unchanged.

name: Heartstabber Mosquito
oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Flying
When Heartstabber Mosquito enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target creature.

name: Induce Despair
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a creature card from your hand.
Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the revealed card's mana value.
flavor_text: All the angel saw was her doom.

name: Joraga Bard
oracle_text: Whenever Joraga Bard or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: Adventuring bards recite *Chanter's Epics*, never-ending tales that keep their comrades' minds alert to danger.

name: Khalni Heart Expedition
oracle_text:
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Khalni Heart Expedition.
Remove three quest counters from Khalni Heart Expedition and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Knight of Cliffhaven
oracle_text:
Level up {3} ({3}: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.)
LEVEL 1-3
2/3
Flying
LEVEL 4+
4/4
Flying, vigilance

name: Makindi Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: As the hedrons began to coalesce into colossal Eldrazi superstructures, the griffins were forced to seek new territory lest their aeries be crushed between the massive stone monoliths.

name: Ondu Giant
oracle_text: When Ondu Giant enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Some druids nurture gardens. Others nurture continents.

name: Read the Bones
oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.

name: Repel the Darkness
oracle_text:
Tap up to two target creatures.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: A boon to those who cannot see in the dark. A bane to those who live in it.

name: Sheer Drop
oracle_text:
Destroy target tapped creature.
Awaken 3—{5}{W} (If you cast this spell for {5}{W}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

name: Stonework Puma
flavor_text:
"We suffer uneasy ground, unstable alliances, and unpredictable magic. Something you can truly trust is worth more than a chest of gold."
—Nikou, Joraga bard

name: Territorial Baloth
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Territorial Baloth gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Its territory is defined by wherever it is at the moment.

name: Torch Slinger
oracle_text:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)
When Torch Slinger enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: Once thrown, twice burned.

name: Turntimber Grove
oracle_text:
Turntimber Grove enters the battlefield tapped.
When Turntimber Grove enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{T}: Add {G}.

name: Ulamog's Crusher
oracle_text:
Annihilator 2 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices two permanents.)
Ulamog's Crusher attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text:
"Whatever the Eldrazi's purpose is, it has nothing to do with something so insignificant as us."
—Nirthu, lone missionary

name: Wildheart Invoker
oracle_text: {8}: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Life as we know it dangles on the brink of extinction. We must show the strength they would steal from us."
—*The Invokers' Tales*
